author: norman
msg: Get sure noone can add or remove a domain from the XMLDomainList after James is started. This is only a workaround which can be removed later when XMLDomainList only needs to implement DomainList

author: sichen
msg: Improved sending of email to contact lists to better handle cases where email addresses are bad or if the email aborts in the middle

author: sichen
msg: UtilValidate.isEmail now has the default isEmail(string) method which accepts formats such as sichen@localhost and isEmail(string, requireDot) which requires formats like sichen@somewhere.com
